thread.title: UK's MHRA brings in stem cell robot to help develop therapies
thread.title_full: UK's MHRA brings in stem cell robot to help develop therapies

author: The Pharma Letter
title: UK's MHRA brings in stem cell robot to help develop therapies
text: 04-04-2024 A new robot that grows stem cells is being trialled by the UK’s Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA). Potentially able to bring safer and more cost-effective treatments to people with a wide range of diseases, the CellQualia Intelligent Cell Processing System is the only one in the world outside of Japan, where it was developed. The trial is part of a UK-based international research program, launched in 2021, and a partnership… This article is accessible to registered users, to continue reading please [register for free](/page/subscribe).
